name: Sparklswap Rewards Token
short_description: SparkleSwap rewards Toke (✨) is the ERC20 token native to the Sparkleswap.finance ecosystem.
description: SparkleSwap rewards Toke (✨) is the ERC20 token native to the Sparkleswap.finance ecosystem. Earn trading incentives for token swaps on Sparkleswap routed to → Uniswap
